name: StarBombAgain
description:
A classic game.

Game area is selectable:
Three sizes are available for iPhone: 7 X 7, 9 X 9, and 11 X 11.
Five for iPad: the three above plus 13 X 13 and 15 X 15.

Percentage of bombs is adjustable.
Total number of bombs is displayed as a hint.

Developed 100% in Swift 3.
No ads.
No in-app purchases.
